creator: ml@cs.toronto.edu
text:
After the following FAQ...

If I have many process across multiple hosts (possibly across multiple timezones) logging to the same 
file using the method above, what happens to timestamps?

...the href tag is not closed, turning the rest of FAQ into a link for #timestamp.

I took a look at http://logging.apache.org/log4j/docs/FAQ.html. Bug seems to be 
fixed. Time to close it ??
creator: sital33@yahoo.com
mprice@atl.lmco.com
text: The page appears to be fixed now so this issue is resolved.
